zone.line: vestige of what was human workmanship.
What are they?
Things Awe inspiring & wonderful things
Are they not caverns such as the
* am amid the
untamed elephants might chuse
Indian wilderness
Wherein to hide her cubs, such as
were the sea to overflow the earth
the mightiest monsters of its deep
would change into their spacious —
unbounded
chambers
Father your words image forth what
I would have expressed, but alas could not
rustling of leaves &
I hear the sound of water, but it does
not rain, like the fast drops of a fountain
among woods;
It falls from among the heaps of ruin
over our heads; its is I suppose the
water collected in their rifts by the
*Clare
